body:
@tombergan sure, here are a few resources:
- mailing list thread in golang-dev: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/golang-dev/Og1p9ECURBI
- document started by Peter B. https://docs.google.com/document/d/18tNd8r5DV0yluCR7tPvkMTsWD_lYcRO7NhpNSDymRr8/edit#heading=h.iqlepug3ce47 which further lists resources.

Hope it helps.
